    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a4abc472b4a1cda9402773595360eb56c729b317</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water wave reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserwelle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion de vague de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão da onda da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione dell'onda dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση κυμάτων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de la onda del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates water waves striking at 45 and 90 to a hard, flat surfaces and the waves reflected from 45 hard, flat surface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flat surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hard surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Wasserwellen,
die bei 45 und 90 zu harten, flachen Oberflächen und zu den Wellen 
reflektiert werden von 45 hart, flache Oberfläche anschlagen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre des vagues de l'eau 
heurtant à 45 et à 90 sur des surfaces dures et plates et les vagues
reflétées de 45 durs, surface plate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra as ondas da água que 
golpeiam em 45 e em 90 a umas superfícies duras, planas e às ondas 
refletidas de 45 duros, uma superfície plana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra le onde dell'acqua che 
colpiscono a 45 ed a 90 alle superfici dure e piane ed alle onde 
riflesse da 45 duri, superficie piana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τα κύματα ύδατος που 
χτυπούν σε 45 και 90 τις σκληρές, επίπεδες επιφάνειες και τα
κύματα που απεικονίζονται από τη σκληρή, επίπεδη επιφάνεια 
45.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra las ondas del agua pulso en
45 y 90 a superficies duras, planas y a las ondas reflejadas a partir 
del 45 dura, superficie plana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Oberflächen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harte Oberflächen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surfaces plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surfaces dures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
